sentence: The Steelers gave Miami their first-round pick for 2020 to acquire Fitzpatrick after Week 2 of the 2019 season.

title: Mark Madden's Hot Take: Instead of trading for Minkah Fitzpatrick, Steelers should have tanked in '19

sentence: Taylor Heinicke was 7-8 as Washington’s starter last season, when the initial plan to go with Ryan Fitzpatrick backfired when the veteran suffered a season-ending injury in Week 1.

title: Seahawks set bar for Russell Wilson trade after declining Commanders’ hefty offer

sentence: If the Steelers cannot come to terms with Fitzpatrick this summer they can tag him next year at this time and could potentially save around $3 million all while controlling his rights through the 2023 season after which another long-term deal could be discussed.

title: What the 2022 franchise tag numbers mean for Steelers' negotiations with Minkah Fitzpatrick

sentence: Now a division foe of the Eagles, Wentz gives the Commanders a stable starter after a revolving door that has included Alex Smith, first-round pick Dwayne Haskins, Ryan Fitzpatrick and Taylor Heinicke.
title: New Commander: Washington to acquire QB Carson Wentz

sentence: “He’s a free agent so, yeah, there’s guys out there with experience like I said [Blaine] Gabbert, [Ryan] Fitzpatrick, Geno [Smith], he’s one of ’em,” Schneider said of the team’s potential interest.
